transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Hello?
Hello?
Hello.
Hello, ha sir.
Executive: Aapka naam?
Customer: Ajeet baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Executive: Wo aap hi ke paas phone aaya hai?
Customer: Haan?
Customer: Aatar baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan, bataiye.
Customer: Aap hi ke paas phone aayega kya malum maine IndiaMART ko phone kiya tha cancel kyun nahi hai janne ke liye.
Executive: To mere paas hi call aayega wo to mai bata hi tha aapko. Ke helpline pe bhi call karenge to mere paas aayega.
Customer: Chaliye mere ko bata to diya aapko maine ye cheez ki aane dijiye mere paas update. Thik hai jaise hi update aata hai mai aapko instant call karta hu.
Executive: Sir teen mahina ho gaya, teen mahina, three months.
Customer: 25 September se hua hai sir. Hum log paas hai last transaction ka. 25 September se hua hai. Last lead purchase aapne 25 December kiya tha.
Executive: 25 December, thik hai.
Customer: 25 September, haan, 25 September ko kiya tha last purchase.
Executive: Do mahina ho gaya na?
Executive: Do mahina hone wala hai, do mahina hua nahi hai lekin ek bar aane dijiye, exact reason aane dijiye ki kya issue raha kyun band hua hai. Kyunki hum log dale hue hai to usme aaya ki GST verify ki wajah se nahi buyer conflict ki wajah se hai. To wahi cheez hum log detail mang rahe hai ki kaun se kis buyer ke sath conflict hua hai aap bataiye unka detail bataiye.
Customer: To maine aapko mail ka screenshot bhi to bheja hai dekhiye unhone bola hai we will update issue lekin abhi tak update aaya nahi hai. Thik hai to aaj nahi to kal tak aa jayega update mai aapko turant inform kar dunga.
Executive: Ek example deta hu sir.
Customer: Haan, bataiye. Hello.
Executive: Haan, bataiye bataiye.
Customer: Hum jo LNT, LNT jo company hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Uska owner hai Larsen and Toubro.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Samjho koi jo bacha court mein appeal kiya ki mai wo mera father hai LNT ka owner.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: To court puchenge ki tumhara jo owner hai uska proof kya hai tumhare paas?
Hello?
Executive: Haan, nahi samjha nahi aap kya keh rahe hai.
Customer: Acche se suno samajh mein aa jayega sir.
Executive: Haan, bataiye.
Customer: Samjho LNT ka jo company hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Jo owner hai unka do do owner hai.
Executive: Larsen and Toubro group, haan bataiye.
Customer: Samjho koi bol raha hai ki mera wo papa hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Koi mera papa hai aisa karke wo exam de raha hai ki mera papa hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To agar court mein jayenge to magistrate to puchenge ki tumhara papa hai kya proof hai uski tumhare paas?
Executive: Haan bilkul dena hi padega.
Customer: To aisa nahi karoge ki uska sampatti lene ke liye tumhara baap bol rahe ho.
Customer: Waisa hi hai jo buyer complaint kiya hai uska detail kya hai kya naam hai kya naam hai paisa dalna hai.
Executive: Are nahi nahi to aane to dijiye ye cheez jaise detail aane dijiye mai bol to raha hu aapko turant bataunga mai. Mere paas bhi nahi detail nahi to mai aapko batata kyun nahi wo jaise jo dekh rahi hai unka naam Shivani hai. Wo handle kar rahi hai to unhone bola hai mail pe reply kiya ki we will update soon. To jaise hi unka koi bhi update aata hai mai instant aapko update kar dunga.
Customer: Thik hai aane dijiye wo detail. Sir haan ka mail aaya update soon aaj nahi to kal tak aa jayega reply mai ek bar us mail pe dobara se wo kar deta hu. Ke reply karne ke liye jaldi.
Executive: Thik hai. Jo mahina intezar kar raha hu, do mahina.
Customer: Thik hai sir ek bar dekh lete hai aane to dijiye ki kya hai. Kis wajah se hai hum log ko bhi pata chale exact.
Executive: Jaise hi reply aata hai mai aapko batata hu.
Customer: Koi kisi ko bol sakta hai ki mera bibi hai uske liye to proof karna padega na ki uska bibi hai. Bilkul nahi nahi dekhiye mai bol to raha hu agar koi complaint kiya hoga to bilkul proof dega tabhi to hum complaint liye honge to aane dijiye pehle kya hai kaun hai pata to chale pehle.
Executive: Actually mujhe bhi nahi pata hai mai aapko bol to raha hu hum log ko bhi jaise koi buyer complaint karta hai to aapke taraf ticket open hota hai. To koi ticket abhi chal nahi raha hai current mein to detail udhar team se aane dijiye jo legal team hai un log ka jaise hi detail aata hai mai aapko turant update karta hu.
Customer: Okay, thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know why account is still cancelled.

- Inquired about the buyer complaint details.



Resolution:

- Executive said he will check and update.

- Executive will follow up on the mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide an update soon.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account, cancellation, buyer complaint, update
